desc: Build stronger communities and support local economy by bying Ember Community Kit. We work with small businesses and makers to compile their unique products into kits and deliver them to your doorsteps. Partial proceeds from sales of each kit support non-profit organizations in need.

layout.text: Building stronger communities one kit at a time!
Ember collaborates with small businesses and makers to gather unique handmade products, assemble them into kits, and deliver them to customers all over the U.S.!
With each kit sale we also make a donation to a nonprofit organization.
